name: Ayrton Senna: Kart Duel Special
overview: Beautifully expressed so far, did not get to express violent behavior, and G next to the Dokutoku racing kart. You can enjoy a full-scale racing car. Ayrton Senna Kart Duel is a series of Karting-based 3D racing video games named after famous Brazilian kart and Formula One racer Ayrton Senna. In Japan, the games were developed and published by Gaps, which were released exclusively for the PlayStation under the license of Ayrton Senna Foundation, and technical advice by Yamaha and Dunlop. It was published in the european market by Sunsoft. The game features 3 difficulty modes (easy, normal & hard), 3 circuits (GAPS, Slope Island & Nasu), the Senna Memmorial (with 2 movies and photographs of Ayrton Senna) and 2 different camera angles (first & third person perspectives).
